content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 1, Brighton and Hove Albion 1.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 1, Brighton and Hove Albion 1.
Beram Kayal (Brighton and Hove Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Joe Allen (Stoke City).
Attempt blocked. Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) header from the right side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Charlie Adam with a cross.
Corner,  Stoke City. Conceded by Dale Stephens.
Attempt blocked. Kurt Zouma (Stoke City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Corner,  Stoke City. Conceded by Lewis Dunk.
Penalty saved! Charlie Adam (Stoke City) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Dale Stephens (Brighton and Hove Albion) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Stoke City. Jesé draws a foul in the penalty area.
Offside, Brighton and Hove Albion. José Izquierdo tries a through ball, but Leonardo Ulloa is caught offside.
Substitution, Brighton and Hove Albion. Anthony Knockaert replaces Solly March.
Corner,  Brighton and Hove Albion. Conceded by Jack Butland.
Attempt saved. José Izquierdo (Brighton and Hove Albion) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Leonardo Ulloa.
Foul by Davy Pröpper (Brighton and Hove Albion).

Substitution, Brighton and Hove Albion. Leonardo Ulloa replaces Glenn Murray.
